snippet: Officials offered assurances that the couple would be allowed to leave the country after an appellate court exonerated them in the 2013 death of their 8-year-old girl.
abstract: Qatari and United States officials offer assurances to American couple Matthew and Grace Huang that all bureaucratic entanglements that had blocked their return to the US have been resolved.
lead_paragraph: Officials offered assurances that the couple would be allowed to leave the country after an appellate court exonerated them in the 2013 death of their 8-year-old girl.

headline.main: Matthew and Grace Huang, Cleared in Daughter’s Death, Are Set to Leave Qatar
headline.print_headline: Qatar: Couple Set to Return to U.S. After Being Exonerated
